meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brian Lehman Anne Kenney Chaplin Justin Sausville Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6209.

td.p: Brian Lehman, a communications manager from Washington, D.C.
Anne Kenney Chaplin, a housing court judge from Truro, Massachusetts
Justin Sausville, a urologist from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 5-day cash winnings total $117,201)

tr.td: THE WORLD TRADE CENTER & GROUND ZERO
HOW I SPENT MY SUMMER VACATION
WHOM DID SHE PORTRAY?
PAN & POT POURRI
FIRST NAME PHRASES
STRAIT AHEAD

Brian
